content.body: I've been thinking about this, and there's a lot of caveats to doing flattening on-demand.
You can't really do it during `.get()` or `.run()`, because there's a possibility that a snapshot has already been taken of the context that can still observe the shadowed Var value.

content.body: And, worse, there's a **future** snapshot after the current `.get()` or `.run()` which could observe it.
